metadata.name: Suspicious Curl Change User Agents - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious curl process start on linux with set useragent options

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/curl')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --user-agent '))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious curl process start on linux with set useragent options

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Scripts created by developers and admins 2. Administrative activity Reference: https://curl.se/docs/manpage.html
